summary: An Ordinance authorizing the Mayor and City Comptroller to issue Local Improvement Bonds for the improvement of Maynard Avenue from Washington Street to Street Boulevard and Sixth Avenue Street et al in the City of Seattle, by constructing sewer under Ordinance No. 21741, creating Local Improvement District No. 2182 prescribing the rate of interest thereon and authorizing their delivery to the contractor constructing the improvement.
